description: This file is an AWS Lambda handler written in Python that provides API endpoints for retrieving bear data, health check, and CORS headers. It defines multiple public interface functions to serve JSON responses based on HTTP requests received via API Gateway.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] get_bears_data()
methods.description: Returns a list of bear records by invoking an external service.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_health_check()
methods.description: Returns a simple dict indicating health status.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] create_cors_headers()
methods.description: Generates CORS headers based on environment configuration.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_response(status_code: int, body: Any, headers: Dict[str, str] = None)
methods.description: Creates an API Gateway compatible response with status, headers, and body.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] lambda_handler(event: Dict[str, Any], context: Any)
methods.description: Main AWS Lambda handler that routes requests based on HTTP method and path.

ctags.name: create_response
ctags.pattern: /^def create_response(status_code: int, body: Any, headers: Dict[str, str] = None) -> Dict[str, An/
ctags.signature: (status_code: int, body: Any, headers: Dict[str, str] = None)

ctags.name: lambda_handler
ctags.pattern: /^def lambda_handler(event: Dict[str, Any], context: Any) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
